title: Gigagotchi
author: Gigagotchi
content: GigaGotchi is a Brand New cryptocurrency token that integrates with an app designed to provide users with a fun and interactive experience while supporting the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (ASPCA). The GigaGotchi app features a range of custom-branded games and functions, including a Gigapet/Tomagotchi-style game, mini games, calculators, fidget spinners, pianos, and AI robots to talk to and help you solve daily tasks. The app also includes an MMO battle playground, sandbox, and park for users to enjoy with their pets.Download our App!!: https://apk.e-droid.net/apk/app2518991-hy8ein.apk?v=3Site : https://gigagotchi.com/Poocoin: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x1193f7dfbdf8b9d9834144e8c6ca01b38d0bb739
